HiddenText.Name: How do I know which months are on my track?
HiddenText.OpenningText: When does my track start and end?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
For International Students, please observe the months indicated rather than seasons.

Winter/Spring (January-April, April-July) Student is off for Fall (September-December).

Spring/Fall (April-July, September-December) Student is off for Winter (January-April).

Fall/Winter (September-December, January-April) Student is off for Spring (April-July).
